column5: Awesome news!
Thats awesome speed!  My thoughts are with the little guy!
That's awesome news Rob.  So glad to hear it.  Joey
Great news Rob, hope all works out for the tough guy.
I am so happy to hear the great news.  Keep up the faith and as a reminder to everyone, cherish every day to the fullest and give your loved ones a hug.
Thanks Rob, that's encouraging news.

Fantastic news Rob!  Chris and your family are in my thoughts and prayers every day.  Thanks so much for the update and making my day. While everyone is praying and thinking about Chris, I wonder if he has any idea of the positive effect he is having on so many others here?
Rob,  That is fantastic news.  Keep your spirits up and your thoughts positive.  John
That is fantastic news.  I hope things continue to progress in that direction.  Jim
Great news Rob, we'll keep praying for Chris.
Great news.
Thats super news Rob.I have been watching a show that is out of Sick Kids. That hospital is amazing,and really put thier best forward.   Still praying here bud.
Great News Rob, I personally believe that prayers do work and we are happy that things are improving for your young guy.   Keep us posted.  Fishergirl72&Fishindevil

That's great news for sure!! I haven't met you or pretty much anyone on the board BUT, your family and more importantly your little guy are in my thoughts every time I log in. There are some good people here. Kids are pretty resilient, I pray that Chris gets through this and your family can go on living a normal life.  Good luck.
I hope it all goes well Speed, nothing worse than having your kids or wife sick!
Great news! HH
Very Glad to here
Good News and God Speed
Great news and continued prayers!!  dk
amazing news

I know a lot of you have been wondering how Chris has been doing and I apologize for not being able to be around more but we had some wonderful and quite unexpected news from the doctors at Sick Children's last week.  He went through his monthly battery of test (CT, MRI bone, blood etc.) They found that the tumours have shrank significantly.    They have no explanation. I am just thanking God and everyone who is praying for him as I am very sure that it helps. He is doing quite well considering he is still taking chemo treatments. He is not out of the woods by any stretch and the chances for a full recovery are still very remote, but it is sure better then the news we were getting before Christmas.  I want to thank all of you for the PM's and the emails and most of all, the prayers.  Take care  Speed
GREAT to hear Rob and I replied to your PM. I am serious with my offering..
fantastic, Rob!!!!!
that is great news
great NEWS, hope all goes well for you family.
Great to hear that Rob.

You know what, I was having a bit of a rough day today (probably feeling a little sorry for myself) but that news just changed all of that..... It's a wonderful day!!!!!!!!!!  Thank you so much for the update but I think I'll just keep on saying a little prayer just for good measure!
....Well that is good news Rob and I'm glad you took a moment to let us know. I know many of us here have been quietly wondering.
Good news Rob, let Chris know we are thinking of him.  Dan
I'm not a religeous person by any stretch of the imagination but I do believe there is something in the power of prayer...  Great news Rob !!!  :clapping:
Great News Rob, you and your family are in our thoughts.
Fantastic, that is the best news I've received today. Glad things are looking up for your son, and please keep us posted...  Mike

That is truly wonderful news.  I know he's not out of the woods yet, but it's great to hear that things have improved.  Our thoughts are with Chris...as well as your family!!!!  Cliff and Carole (bly)
Thanks to Rob for the update on how Chris is doing these days.  I'm very glad that whatever is being done is working.  Chris is a trouper for sure.  Best to you and your son, Rob.
Thats great to hear!!
Glad to hear things are improving
That is great news Rob.. Hope it continues that way
Like all the others have said, that's GREAT news Rob, that Chris sure is a tough little fella....thanks for the update.  Maureen
Thanks for sharing the positive news!
man what great news!  Lets hope it keeps getting better!  Cheers!
Great news! I think we all might might learn a little something from Chris. I hope things continue to get better.  Whopper

Great news i know hospitals are not a fun place but if you have to be in one sick kids is where you want to be.I have spent a lot of time there with my little sister and that place has done wonders for my family the doctors are great and take the time to explain everything thing.I have even had the docs call my house as i do not live with my mom and sister and talk and expail things.anyways great to hear things are looking up.good luck to you and your family .     JEREMY

Rob,  I have been wondering how things were going for you and Chris.... Dude you just gave me a few tears.... seriously!... I am glad to hear things are looking up for Chris... He is a strong kid (fought it off before) and can do it again!! I have no doubt about it!!! I have thought about you guys alot and whenever you guys pop into my mind I say a little prayer...  I just told my other, and she was all smiles and wishes him the best and all the strength muster.   God Bless the both of you.   Gerritt.
Thats great news Rob keep up the fight you have one tough son there give him another hug from me an the family
